languages.text: {n}"В теле, мыслях и душе ты должен обладать мною. Я — не просто отсутствие пятен, я приближаю тебя к Спасителю."{/n}
{n}"In your body, mind, and soul, you must possess me. I am no mere absence of stains; I bring you closer to Him."{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}"В теле, мыслях и душе ты должен обладать мною. Я — не просто отсутствие пятен, я приближаю тебя к Спасителю."{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}"In your body, mind, and soul, you must possess me. I am no mere absence of stains; I bring you closer to the Saviour."{/n}
{n}"In your body, mind, and soul, you must possess me. I am no mere absence of stains; I bring you closer to the Saviour."{/n}
{n}"In your body, mind, and soul, you must possess me. I am no mere absence of stains; I bring you closer to the Saviour."{/n}

{n}"In your body, mind, and soul, you must possess me. I am no mere absence of stains; I bring you closer to Him."{/n}
{n}"In your body, mind, and soul, you must possess me. I am no mere absence of stains; I bring you closer to Him."{/n}

languages.text: {n}« Vous devez me posséder dans votre corps, votre esprit et votre âme. Je ne suis pas seulement l'absence de souillure, je vous rapproche également de Lui. »{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}"In your body, mind, and soul, you must possess me. I am no mere absence of stains; I bring you closer to Him."{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}« Vous devez me posséder dans votre corps, votre esprit et votre âme. Je ne suis pas seulement l'absence de souillure, je vous rapproche également de Lui. »{/n}

languages.text: {n}«En tu cuerpo, mente y alma, debes poseerme. No soy la mera ausencia de mácula; yo te acerco más a Él».{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}"In your body, mind, and soul, you must possess me. I am no mere absence of stains; I bring you closer to Him."{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}«En tu cuerpo, mente y alma, debes poseerme. No soy la mera ausencia de mácula; yo te acerco más a Él».{/n}

languages.text: {n}“我在你的身体、思想与灵魂之中，你必须占有我。我不仅没有一丝污秽，还会让你更加接近帝皇。”{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}"In your body, mind, and soul, you must possess me. I am no mere absence of stains; I bring you closer to Him."{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}“我在你的身体、思想与灵魂之中，你必须占有我。我不仅没有一丝污秽，还会让你更加接近帝皇。”{/n}

languages.text: {n}「あなたの身体、精神、魂、それらすべてで私を持つのだ。 私は単なるシミの不在ではなく、あなたを神に近づける存在だ」{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}"In your body, mind, and soul, you must possess me. I am no mere absence of stains; I bring you closer to Him."{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}「あなたの身体、精神、魂、それらすべてで私を持つのだ。 私は単なるシミの不在ではなく、あなたを神に近づける存在だ」{/n}

languages.text: {n}"In Eurem Körper, Eurem Geist und Eurer Seele müsst Ihr mich besitzen. Ich bin keine bloße Abwesenheit von Flecken. Ich bringe Euch näher an ihn heran."{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}"In your body, mind, and soul, you must possess me. I am no mere absence of stains; I bring you closer to Him."{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}"In Eurem Körper, Eurem Geist und Eurer Seele müsst Ihr mich besitzen. Ich bin keine bloße Abwesenheit von Flecken. Ich bringe Euch näher an ihn heran."{/n}

languages.text: {n}"Bedeninde, zihninde ve ruhunda bana sahip olmalısın. Ben yalnızca lekesizlik değilim, ben seni O'na yaklaştırırım."{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}"In your body, mind, and soul, you must possess me. I am no mere absence of stains; I bring you closer to Him."{/n}
